response.overview: Twenty animated objects are told by a speaker box that they can win Dream Island, a 1 square mile island of paradise that includes luxurious facilities, a casino, robot servants, a 5-star hotel, and 6 restaurants. The objects are told that they will have to compete in a challenge and they believe that the winner would win the island and will be able to choose who can and can't go with them.
response.title: BFDI 1: Take the Plunge
